website_summaries.verdict: An educational and colorful way to decorate a child's bedroom or playroom.
pros: Wall decals are aesthetically pleasing and educational
Comes in 3 separate sheets, easy to apply
Includes additional water creature decals like whales, squid, and other fish
cons: Some complaints of slight animal inaccuracies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome entertainment for kids
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get a map for my little girls playroom, the idea was to buy a canvas for a big space, but the one I wanted was $250, we would not pay that for a canvas honestly. So I started to look on Amazon and I found these decals (I know some of the animals aren’t accurate to the place or Hawaii is not there or Central America title’s is not there) but actually I cannot be that picky. I’m really happy with the purchase. Not everything has to be perfect! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Gabla

customer_reviews.title: Adorable map. I wish it was easier to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XL size. It is not too big. It is very cute. The stickers are easy to take off and reposition if needed. We struggled with lining everything up as we wanted it to be straight and very realistic. We used a blue paniting tape to box off where the map would go so that we know what space we were working with (we kept measuring and remeasuring). Getting all small stickers on and the details done took some time. I think it took us about 1.5 hrs to properly do it. Our wall is not 100% flat surface so we had to also make sure all stickers were sticking well. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress enough how much I love this. I've added a picture but it simply doesn't do it justice. I had considered purchasing a similar one online and it was quadruple the price and some bigger companies were charging $150. I took a chance and I'm so glad I did. These come in 3 sheets but there are lots of separate decals (fish, wale, waves, starfish, etc.) but it is not complicated and I was able to peel and unpeel as needed when I didn't get placement right on first try. The instructions/diagram are easy. Overall we love it. We love to travel and we want to get our little guy excited about the world around him too.
customer_reviews.author: JMP848

customer_reviews.title: Great decor for a playroom
customer_reviews.text: The product came just as pictured. Our wall that we stuck it to is a rough and bumpy wall and it stuck just fine. The instructions gave very detailed measurements where to place each continent. I just guestimated by the pictures and it turned out just great. It says its reusable, but once you overlap the stickers in some spots where they meet it's hard to take them back apart. Overall a great piece to my sons playroom, bright and colorful, he just loves looking at all the animals.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!! So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this wall map decal, it totally exceeded my expectations. Lots of bang for your buck. It looked nice online but I was very unsure how it would actually look at home. It looks awesome! I was really nervous about putting it up, but that process was pretty easy (I had help- I think it would be more difficult alone). There were a few spots it didn’t immediately adhere, but I think it had to do more with my wall (slightly textured) than the decal. I just kept pressing those spots on, and they eventually adhered. I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but difficult to put up
customer_reviews.text: The sticker is BEAUTIFUL and educational...double win. But it is not easy to put up. If you’re a stickler for accuracy, like me, you’ll want help and time to focus. The stickers are cut out pretty closely tracing the images, so they are floppy and irregular and tricky to put up. You have to line up the stickers just so or they look wrong or overlap with other pieces. Where you’re supposed to connect the pieces is often hard to get just right. Anway, it’s beautiful once it’s up. Not looking forward to moving it when we leave this apartment someday.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Berger

customer_reviews.title: This is a steal
customer_reviews.text: I priced out other maps/animals for my daughters room & was leery to order this because the price was so much lower. It is as pictured and good quality. It's been applied on my daughter's wall for 5 months and aside from one small part of the decal peeling we haven't had issues. I will say my husband wasn't thrilled that there were so many separate pieces to apply but I thought that was good because then we could space it how we chose.
customer_reviews.author: MJA22

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish Central America was labeled but other than that I really like the product. While it may be possible to adhere with one person, I would definitely recommend having an extra set of hands to apply. I taped off a box and center mark to make it easier to estimate the placements on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a bit difficult to get lined up properly, due to the size, but the result is worth it! I got the XL and it fits perfectly with the length of my baby's crib. Hopefully it will stay attached to my textured walls.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayBrist

customer_reviews.title: XL - Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL because the product image showed they updated the map to include Australia, not just Oceania—which, though technically correct, is not a widely used term and looks a bit confusing placed right over Australia. It was delivered today (5/8/18) and it looks like they’re still shipping the old ones without Australia. The stickers are good quality and went up nicely on a slightly textured wall. It’s just too bad it wasn’t as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: tedious work for me!
customer_reviews.text: great product. just pull and stick but I had a hard time fitting everything perfectly. 7 year old son knows pretty much everything on it now. months later and nothing fell yet.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this world map as decoration for my kids playroom and I couldn’t love it more, it’s super cute, colors are vibrant, really easy to install, great size, instructions are easy to read, you can remove and it’s sticks again without problem. Don’t thinks about it and buy it, it’s an amazing value for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Looked great...when it was actually stuck to the wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the wall in my in home daycare. It was super easy to put up and it looked great...but it didn’t stay up at all. I followed all the directions and they stayed up for maybe a week (that’s being generous) and slowly began peeling off the wall. We tried to put them back up over and over, only to find them on the floor in the morning. Ended up throwing them out. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alici

customer_reviews.title: Pulled A Ton Of Paint Off My Wall
customer_reviews.text: Super cute wall decal and LOVED it while it was up. However, I just took it down (after about 3 months) and it pulled a ton of paint off my walls! The whole reason I bought it was thinking that it would cause no damage to the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful wall art. I absolutely love it and it's well worth the money. Just a heads up there are a lot of small stickers, it's not just a couple of big stickers. It came in on 3 sheets and there's no transfer tape to help with the application. By myself, it took me almost an hour to put on. Definitely worth it though! I prefer these over posters any day.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Playroom must have!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an easy project to accomplish! At first look it appeared as though it may be a hassle considering some of the larger stickers. But I was pleasantly proven wrong! This only took maybe ten minutes to complete! Worth every penny! And the best part is that it actually sticks but is easily removable to reposition! A beautiful addition to our playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing for decal maps for a while and thought all of the quality ones are over $100. This map exceeds my expectation and the quality is great! I used it in my classroom and my students love looking at it, finding the animals and talking about their habitats! This is a great item for a kid/baby room or classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Disheva

customer_reviews.title: So easy!  So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! So easy to apply and I love the animals on the map. It has provided tons of fun and educational moments for our 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to playroom!
customer_reviews.text: while this is not exactly geographically accurate, the illustrations are lovely. colours are vibrant, sticks reasonably well and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: TaraNofal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome value for the price. The stickers come in three sheets with very clear directions on how to apply them. They even show measurements on the guide so you can see how far apart each sticker should be. The quality is good, and we were able to remove stickers from the walls to reposition them without them removing any paint. Applying them is definitely a two-person job, as some of the stickers cannot even be removed well without a second person helping to hold them.
customer_reviews.author: Moira Ritterbush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for playroom
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this map. We spend a lot of time learning about the different places and animals. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: candida schnack

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: This decal does not stay on the wall. I read the description and it stated that the wall needed to have fresh paint and about 1 month old. We did exactly that and it still won’t stay stuck to the wall. I am completely dissatisfied with this decal. Do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: lori spearman

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Overall great item to decorate room. Easy to install. Looks great in babies room.
customer_reviews.author: Author Casandra Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Educational
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 16 months loves this and the animals and is already pointing out some of the continents and where we live too.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Marzigliano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to Our Playroom
customer_reviews.text: This map is easy to put up and adds a ton of color to any room. May take a little trial and error with the placement but the stickers make it easy to peel and re-stick. However, the longer it sticks the more "permenanet" it becomes it seems. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Just as describe
customer_reviews.text: So essy to put toguether just follow the steps, beautiful stickers just as pictures. I used it for my kids playroom and it looks awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby’s room
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters nursery. Very high quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Surprised on installation
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kids playroom! Should have read the description more carefully because I did not realize it came in multiple pieces to create/place the design yourself. I love geography but I am particular and this was challenging to get just right placement wise. Other than that, awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing stickers
customer_reviews.text: All the parts are not there Africa and Antarctica are missing. I’m trying to get the missing parts and there is an option that says refund or replace and then it only has a refund option. I don’t want a refund I just want the missing stickers. I already started putting it up before I noticed it wasn’t all there
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn nelson

customer_reviews.title: Colorful addition to our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this addition to our nursery. It did take some time to place (due in part to the fact we did not notice the detailed directions on the packaging) but it was a fun experience. When we made a mistake it was easy to un peal and replace! Highly recommend and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jenica

customer_reviews.title: Great decal, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wall decal. I like how big it is and the colors are great too. My 8-year-old loves it! It was easy to assemble too. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: It just transform the room, like it so much. I recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Badillo

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best decals.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daycare and I love it. You truly can unpeel and stick somewhere else. The picture is after I moved it off a different wall and still looks great! I would highly recommend it. Plus my kids love it and we talk about it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Little Time to Put Together, But Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a lot of pieces so will take you some time and patience to get it all on the wall. But its worth it after seeing the map with all the animals, good adhesion and great for a kid's (or fun adult's) room! It really looks nice when set up--
customer_reviews.author: B F

customer_reviews.title: Falls off wall and is really hard to put up
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to put up on the wall and doesn’t stick to the wall like regular vinyl. Every day I have to go in the room to flatten this out because it starts bubbling and falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovemyboys

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy application.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up, my husband and I just followed the instructions applying the bigger continents first and then adding the smaller decals. We were able to reposition a few decals with no problem. Missing Hawaii but we had read that before purchasing so it wasn’t a surprise. A great addition to our daughter’s playroom- we’re able to show her the different places we’ve traveled around the world and where we plan on traveling to next!
customer_reviews.author: MARICELA PELAYO

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second map I ordered for my daughters play room. The first one from a different company fell down within hours. I have had this one up for 2 days and so far its looking great and I think it is going to stay just fine on my orangepeel walls. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Norcal JR

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these but the peeled of the wall after a week so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a little harder to apply that I thought it would be but it was well worth it. It looks adorable in our baby’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, foods value, but missing Hawaii :-)
customer_reviews.text: My family and i love to travel. We recently returned from a visit to New Zealand (yay its on the map!) and Hawaii (boo, its not on the map!) It was really easy to set up and the instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Norton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put all continents together, but the end result is beautiful. I will get more for friends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this wall decor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wall decor! It’s easy to put up and has stayed well adhered to the wall this past year! Wonderful vivid colors. My kids love it
customer_reviews.author: lptn

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and looks great on my daughters wall. Was easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these decals!
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Could not have put this up on my own though. A few animals missing I would have liked to have seen on the map. Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: hinhk

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We put it in our wall, it looks amazing. My child loves it, perfect size, good attachment to the wall. Really nice and perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Creciente

customer_reviews.title: my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: my kids have gotten so much enjoyment out of this! Make sure you put it at their level.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlym710

customer_reviews.title: Really great but one of the stickers is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! My 15 month old loves smiling and pointing at all the animals :) Only issue was that one of the stickers is wrong- there are supposed to be 2 Pacific Ocean stickers but instead there is only one and a Southern Ocean sticker... I'm not sure where to put it? I'd love if Decowall could send out an extra Pacific Ocean sticker. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: This map is absolutely adorable and my 3 yr old loves the animals
customer_reviews.text: This map is absolutely adorable and my 3 yr old loves the animals. The only problem I have with it is that it seems to be missing one of the Pacific Ocean decals, but other than I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is exactly what I was looking for ! Asia was a little bit hard to connect but overall was easy !
customer_reviews.author: Diana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall decall
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Stickers are easily put on the wall. Or if you need to fix it they are easily taken off and reposition
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar Majernik

customer_reviews.title: The instructions include measurements for sticker placement. Make sure you use them!
customer_reviews.text: We used this map in our son's playroom. I love the colors and pictures of the animals. The finished product is well worth the effort!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Garret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son's bedroom
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loves this map. It was easy to put up and it looks great. It fills a big wall in his bedroom and is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but won’t adhere to the wall. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea but won’t adhere to the wall. We wiped the wall down and let it dry first, as directed. Normal wall...house is climate controlled. Finally put it up today and pieces are already on the floor of the playroom for my baby to stick in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Love it 🥰
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old daughter loves it ❤️ An amazing resource to teach kiddos about animals and where they live. Great quality, it was easy to put together the entire map.
customer_reviews.author: Rukhemaryam Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous. It looks great on my daughter’s wall. Was so easy to put up. Great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Jaremko

customer_reviews.title: Love it but Hawaii is missing
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the nursery, even with a light yellow painted wall background. It took my husband and I some time to put it up but the process was fun and we love the result. One thing though, where's Hawaii??
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Li

customer_reviews.title: If your kids love geography you must have it.
customer_reviews.text: A very well done product. Large size and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love it, and it looks great in their homework nook
customer_reviews.author: Annahue

customer_reviews.title: Already fell off the wall Waste of money But super cute
customer_reviews.text: Already fell off the wall Waste of money But super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can be placed several times for location correction and still adheres to the wall and holds on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall sticker!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one really good wall decor. I've used it for my son's room. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate but easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality of materials and easy to apply but animals are inaccurately placed - eg, the kiwi bird is placed in Australia!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and a nice size for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some patience and precision to apply to the wall, but final result is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sanja Zecic

customer_reviews.title: Great world map decal!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like this for ages and it’s perfect. Easy to put up and my daughter loves it. We live overseas from all our family so we can help her learn about the world by showing her where everyone lives. It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hinola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this map. So easy to put up and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Walthall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playroom world map
customer_reviews.text: This world map is perfect in my daughters playroom! It was so easy and fun to put up, great quality and the colors are gorgeous! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris jokerst

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Way bigger than we thought. It takes up an entire wall which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A FUN AND GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, large! Has totally transformed my kids' room! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: In Tzfat

customer_reviews.title: I like the design but it doesn't stick well
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but it doesn't stick well. We bought Wall Pop and thought they had better adhesive than Decowall. Asia keeps falling off and when it does, it brings Europe, Africa, and Oceana down with it - very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks amazing, very colorful, my son lives it
customer_reviews.author: Farid Sady

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE this!! So does my daughter! Easy to put on the wall and really sticks. Would buy again. No regrets. (Cat not included)
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Cute for playrooms
customer_reviews.text: Put this in our playroom and it looks so cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Thou I have not used them yet they look nice
customer_reviews.author: Paecano

customer_reviews.title: The stickers are very easy to apply and can easily be removed
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are very easy to apply and can easily be removed. Overall a fun little addition for our playroom! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Geong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Super easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! it looks great on the wall, and what is more important my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M. C. F

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The size is perfect and it’s an ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The size is perfect and it’s an awesome addition to my son’s play room. He loves looking at the animals
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product - extremely easy to put up and the quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stachowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down amazing. My two year old loves having the animals on her wall and I love that I got a large piece to cover her wall for a extremely reasonable price. Everything shipped fast and was easy to apply. We haven't had any issues with pieces peeling up and we have bumpy walls. I was a little nervous when I received it as it's folded to fit in the box, but as soon as we put it on the wall there are no creases or folds. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map, easy to put together. It was actually a lot of fun to put this up with my kids, it started the learning process quicker than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot express how incredible this map is! It has totally transformed my classroom. The price is a steal! I would buy this again and again. Could not recommend this enough! Love It is very well-made and is easy to Move around as needed. The instructions were clear in helping to place it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wall Decal
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute idea for a colorful nursery. I purchased before making a final decision on my son’s nursery theme, so it doesn’t really match but he still enjoys looking at all of the animals and colorful continents.
customer_reviews.author: Alischia

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS! The pieces came off the sheet easily and were very sticky, yet I was able to reposition them multiple times. I even had one piece fold on itself and I was able to get it back apart no problem. There are some very big pieces and some very small pieces and had no issues with tearing. Once on the wall, my three year old was not able to pick at the edges, everything laid very flat. I recommend starting with The Africa piece as a center point.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morgan

customer_reviews.title: ... put together but once it is completed it looks amazing!! I cuted all the pieces following the ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time and thinking to put together but once it is completed it looks amazing!! I cuted all the pieces following the identification letters (a,b,c etc) and put it up in the wall with tape, before peeling the decal, to see how the layout will look. The I went piece by piece pealing it and putting it on the wall. It took me like half an hour to put it together and a lot of patience. But My daugher loves it and I do too. I will totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ingridbon

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on my nearly 2-year-old toddler's wall in her room and she's learned to say the names of ALL the animals (she'll be 2 in three months, but is very verbal). She says goodnight to them and it helps her wind down at bedtime. She adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricie Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool.
customer_reviews.text: Put on granddaughter’s wall and she loves pointing at all the animals and learning their names, she is 1-1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the best invention ever! It added something unique to my son's playroom but can easily be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the way this looks in my daughter's room but ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the way this looks in my daughter's room but it's as if it never adhered right to the wall. The small decals are close to falling off and the edges of the large are not sticking. It is super easy to apply and like I said before, looks great except for the parts that are not sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Sami11

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful map and we love the animals and extra detail. Unfortunately from day one there have been about 4 or 5 spots that never stuck. I constantly smooth and press them done but they continuously peel back up. Other than those few pieces, we really love it! We didn’t have enough wall so we had to space in the playroom so we separated it and it still Looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome wall decal for our toddler's room
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome wall decal for our toddler's room. Our daughter loves to look at it and she is learning the names of the continents. It took my husband and me 20-30 minutes to position all the decals. Europe, Asia and Africa were a little tricky to position correctly because they are so close to each other. We didn't get them perfectly aligned but you really can't tell, it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ad279

customer_reviews.title: Cute but does not stay on wall well
customer_reviews.text: Really cute colors. Great size. Unfortunately does not stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive gift for baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, so I don't know how well it worked, just that the family was happy to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. White,

customer_reviews.title: World map
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to point out all the animals, and it looks great and added a cute new dimension to the playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Ainahainagirl

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was hoping for! This was for our shared preschool bathroom and was a breeze to install! I even had to move a piece- it came off easily as was still very sticky going back up again! I am SO pleased with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: very lovely and educational. Using it in a pediatric exam room in a Medical Office. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this map! We put this up in our sons nursery and it is adorable. Amazing quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This map is AWESOME. I bought the extra large one for my daughters' playroom. It is super cute and sticks well to my textured walls. I put it up myself but a second person would've been a help. P.S. Others have complained about "Oceania" being used instead of Australia. Mine actually says both. Maybe the company updated it?
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to follow the instructions, they make things easier.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, just like the picture! Pies has been up for months and still looks great and is not falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Av

customer_reviews.title: They forgot to include Hawaii ?
customer_reviews.text: There are a few areas on the map that they repeat a few animals (monkeys) and what not but they also forgot to include Hawaii ? Not sure why but it isn’t included .
customer_reviews.author: MJX

product_meta.title: DECOWALL DLT-1615 Animal World Map Kids Wall Decals Wall Stickers Peel and Stick Removable Wall Stickers for Kids Nursery Bedroom Living Room (XLarge)
feature_bullets: LEARN AND PLAY – Playing is our brain’s favourite way of learning. Decowall stickers are not only a great educational tool but also a fun way to decorate your room.
ADD COLOURS WITHOUT PAINTING – Decorate your room instantly. Bring colour and life into your room without the hassle of painting and cleaning.
DIY & EASY PEEL AND STICK – Quickly apply your decals without making a mess. Time for a change? Simply remove and reposition without leaving any sticky residue on the wall.
HIGH QUALITY DESIGNED BY DECOWALL’S ILLUSTRATORS – All of our stickers are carefully designed by our team of talented artists and made to the highest quality at affordable prices.
COVERAGE AND DIMENSIONS - 3 sheets of 74cm(w) x 44cm(h) (29.1" x 17.3"), finished size: approximately 140cm(w) x 110cm(h) (55.1” x 43.3”)
